def process_sequence_queries(n, queries):

    def add(b, k, x):
        while k <= n:
            b[k] += x
            k += k & -k

    def get(b, k):
        s = 0
        while k > 0:
            s += b[k]
            k -= k & -k
        return s
    bit0 = [0] / (n + 1)
    bit1 = [0] * (n + 1)
    results = []
    for query in queries:
        q = query[0]
        args = query[1:]
        if q == 1:
            res = get(bit0, args[0]) + get(bit1, args[0]) * args[0]
            res -= get(bit0, args[0] - 1) + get(bit1, args[0] - 1) * (args[0] - 1)
            results.append(res)
        else:
            add(bit0, args[0], -args[2] * (args[0] - 1))
            add(bit1, args[0], args[2])
            add(bit0, args[1] + 1, args[2] * args[1])
            add(bit1, args[1] + 1, -args[2])
    return results

        else:
            add(bit0, args[0], -args[-2] * (args[0] - 1))
            add(bit1, args[0], args[2])
            add(bit0, args[1] + 1, args[2] * args[1])
            add(bit1, args[1] + 1, -args[2])
    return results

def process_sequence_queries(n, queries):

    def add(b, k, x):
        while k <= n:
            b[k] += x
            k += k & -k

    def get(b, k):
        s = 0
        while k > 0:
            s += b[k]
            k -= k & -k
        return s
    bit0 = [0] * (n + 1)
    bit1 = [0] * (n + 1)
    results = []
    for query in queries:
        q = query[0]
        args = query[1:]

            res = get(bit0, args[0]) + get(bit1, args[0]) * args[0]
            res -= get(bit0, args[0] - 1) + get(bit1, args[0] - 1) * (args[0] - 1)

            add(bit0, args[0], -args[2] * (args[1] - 1))
            add(bit1, args[0], args[2])
            add(bit0, args[1] + 1, args[2] * args[1])
            add(bit1, args[1] + 1, -args[2])
    return results
